FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the database row

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: the submission of the guarian for this survey

FIELD.NAME: enrolmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the student enrolment on the remote Moodle site.

FIELD.NAME: enrolmentcompleteddate
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when the student had his enrolment marked as completed on the remote Moodle site.

FIELD.NAME: guardianid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the guardian who needs to fill up the survey.

FIELD.NAME: coursename
FIELD.COMMENT: the course name of the enrolment.

FIELD.NAME: studentfullname
FIELD.COMMENT: the student fullname to be displayed - can be retrieve on the remote site by the enrolment id.

FIELD.NAME: completeddate
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when the survey was completed - when not completed the field is equal to 0.

FIELD.NAME: emailsentdate
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the last email sent to the guardian - so the plugin knows if it needs to sent a new email.

FIELD.NAME: firstaccessdate
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when the guardian accessed the survey the first time.

FIELD.NAME: lastaccessdate
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when the guardian accessed the survey the last time.
